usage.description: Initializes an interactive session to create a package.json file
Creates a package.json file with default values

commands.name: install
commands.description: Installs a package and any packages that it depends on

usage.description: Installs all dependencies for the current project
Installs [package-name] globally
Installs [package-name] and updates package.json and lock files for production
Installs [package-name] and updates package.json and lock files for development
Installs [package-name]@[version] and updates package.json and lock files
Installs [package-name]@[tag] and updates package.json and lock files

commands.name: uninstall
commands.description: Uninstalls a package and any packages that it depends on

usage.description: Uninstalls [package-name] from package.json and lock files
Uninstalls [package-name] globally

commands.name: update
commands.description: Updates packages to their latest version based on the specified range

usage.description: Updates production packages to their latest version
Updates development packages to their latest version
Updates [package-name] to its latest version

commands.name: ls
commands.description: Lists all dependencies for the current working directory

usage.description: Lists all dependencies for the current working directory with a depth of 0
Lists all dependencies for the current working directory

commands.name: outdated
commands.description: Checks all outdated packages for the current working directory

usage.description: Checks all outdated packages for the current working directory

commands.name: pack
commands.description: Creates a compressed tarball archive of package dependencies.

usage.description: Creates a compressed tarball archive of package dependencies

commands.name: audit
commands.description: Perform a vulnerability audit against the installed packages

usage.description: Audits packages for known vulnerabilities
Audits packages for vulnerabilities with a severity level of <level>
Audits packages for known vulnerabilities and automatically fixes them
